subject: your opinion needed: package for unit testing codes
msgSnippet: should it be the same as the packge for the source codes been tested or not? my colleagues argued that it makes it easy to test the protected methods or packge
messageBody:
should it be the same as the packge for the source
codes been tested or not?

my colleagues argued that it makes it easy to test
the protected methods or packge scope methods if
they live in the same package.

thanks,
Mark
